header.description: I'm Kirill Bogolyubsky. I develop animated, modern and trending websites with pixel accuracy, with clean and supported code in Vue 3, React 19 or Vanilla JavaScript.

description.animated: I will create a stylish, animated website with precise Pixel Perfect layout. I use modern front-end and back-end technologies (Vue 3 / Nuxt 3, React 19 / Next 15, NestJS, Express). I will provide step-by-step support and clean, easily maintainable code.
description.site: I will create a static website using Pixel Perfect, taking into account edits, using modern web technologies: Vue 3 / Nuxt 3 or React 19 / Next 15. I also develop a backend on NestJS or Express, if server-side logic is required.
description.translate: I will help your site on Vue, React or WordPress reach the international level - I will translate it into any desired languages.
description.tilda: I will develop a website on Tilda with a well-thought-out structure, adaptive design and quick launch. I use the powerful capabilities of the tool and finalize the details of your project.
description.wordpress: I will develop a website on WordPress with a user-friendly design, SEO optimization, SSL protection and support for various languages. I use proven templates and plugins.
description.figma: I will develop a high-quality, modern and user-friendly website design in Figma that meets trends and your expectations.

about.title: about me
about.name: Kirill Bogolyubsky
about.description: Frontend developer, I create modern, fast and user-friendly websites. I work with Vue 3, React 19, Nuxt, Next and know how to configure backend on NestJS and Express. I love creating animated interfaces and responsive websites. I develop both static and dynamic pages with multilingual support.
